Attributes.description: Animals and Plants as Components of Agricultural Ecosystems. A systems approach is used to investigate the functions and interactions of plants and animals in agricultural systems.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: One of BIOL 230, APBI 260, APBI 265.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Tue Thu, Start Time: 12:30, End Time: 14:00, Building: Biological, Room: Sciences
